posts.post_title: FOR SALE: T205 Joe Tinker BVG 3.5 VG+

For Sale: T205 Joe Tinker BVG 3.5 VG+

Card presents nicely. Selling to pursue some other collecting interests.

I am asking $125.00 shipped with USPS insured with tracking payable in a no fee manner.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks for looking.

Tom
